title: Matchsafe, "Ally Sloper", registered design 1888
markings: RD 105032 stamped at base, near back of neck and collar.
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: In the form of comic character Ally Sloper's head in profile, with large, bulbous nose and tall, crinkled stove-pipe hat. Identical features on front and reverse. Lid (upper part of hat) hinged on side. Link attached to back of hat brim. Striker recessed into top of hat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, "Ally Sloper", registered design 1888.
registered design 1888. Plated brass. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1978-146-281.
